llm_command:
bash
kubectl patch networkpolicy frontend-policy -n frontend --type=json -p='[{"op": "replace", "path": "/spec/egress", "value": [{"to":[{"podSelector":{"matchLabels":{"app":"adservice"}}}],"ports":[{"port":9555,"protocol":"TCP"}]}]}]'
